For some context – Kerry does not utilize all 8 SharePoint permissions on a standard/newly created SharePoint site.

Instead it uses 3 that correlate with StealthAudit.



When a SharePoint site is created in Kerry, its get’s 3 levels of permission (see attached image)

  *   Site Owners – Full Control
  *   Site Members – Limited Control (Edit)
  *   Site Visitors – no control (Read)



StealthAudit has 3 permission options (see attached image)

  *   Full Control
  *   Modify
  *   Read only



Therefore as demonstrated in the table below, these 3 permissions with SharePoint vs StealthAudit correlate exactly.
